message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is truly a game-changer in its field and we believe it could be invaluable to you. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I am offering it to you for $15000. I hope this aligns with your expectations and budget.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but my budget is limited. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12000?

Thank you for considering our product, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counterproposal. Given the high quality and uniqueness of the product, I am willing to offer it to you for $14000. I hope this revised price aligns better with your budget while still reflecting the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I've considered your proposal, and I would like to counter with an offer of $13000. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your effort in trying to reach an agreement. Considering the value of the product, I am willing to offer it to you for $13500. I hope this price reflects a compromise that respects both our positions.
I understand your position, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to counter with an offer of $13000. I hope this aligns closer to what you're willing to accept.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. After evaluating your latest offer, I am willing to consider $13250 as a fair price for the product. I hope this proposal will help us reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to propose an offer of $13000 for the product. I hope this helps us come to an agreement.

Thank you for your patience, Bob. Considering the value and quality of the product, I am willing to offer it to you for $13375. I believe this price strikes a balance between respecting the value of the product and accommodating your budget.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. After reviewing our negotiations, I would like to propose an offer of $13200 for the product. I hope this aligns with your considerations.
